Name: Havelaar Caf√©
Review Text: Great place for a party!!! Great music, laid back atmosphere. The owner and staff are so great and made sure we were taken care of. DJ booth upstairs, good for small or large groups, layout means it works well for all different purposes. Also love popping in here for a casual drink anytime and always has a friendly welcoming vibe!!!

Name: Havelaar Caf√©
Review Text:
Great beer, and even more great ambiance. The bartender is very nice and welcoming.
Highly recommend!!

Name: Havelaar Caf√©
Review Text: Cool bar,  and patrons. Kind of an eclectic mix of folks enjoying good local brews..  Lots of artist and (american) hippies as well as british drum and bass types.

Name: Havelaar Caf√©
Review Text: Great bar with great art by local street artists, very fun place to have a drink

Review Text: Incredibly friendly staff! Cheap beer prices, especially for being in the center of the city. Awesome events like Cheeky Monday. Always a fun place to be!

Name: Havelaar Caf√©
Review Text: I have been living in the Netherlands for 2,5 years, and I have never seen a person more rude than the owner of this place. Such a shame that this kind of people still exist!
